tricktionary-be#

TypeScript Express API

  • ported from this original JavaScript Express API

UPDATED FOR AWS ELASTIC BEANSTALK... READ ABOUT IT HERE!

Requirements

  • NodeJS
  • a PostGreSQL server

#

local environment

PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@database:5432/
BASE_URL=http://0.0.0.0

#

Install

git clone https://github.com/story-squad/tricktionary-be
cd tricktionary-be
npm install

#

Commands

#

npm run build
  • Clean, lint, & transpile TS -> JS.

#

npm start
  • start the app.

#

Endpoints

PathTableNotes
/api/wordsWords
/api/votesVotes
/api/user-rounds/User-Rounds
/api/round/Rounds
/api/reactionsReactions
/api/definitionsDefinitions
/api/definition-reactionsDefinition-Reactions
/api/auth*JWT

#

Web Socket Handlers
